SELECT pt.trainer_promotion_notice_code AS 'trainerPromotionNoticeCode', pt.trainer_promotion_name AS 'trainerPromotionName', pt.trainer_promotion_recruit_start_date AS 'trainerPromotionRecruitStartDate', pt.trainer_promtion_recruit_end_date AS 'trainerPromotionRecruitEndDate', pt.trainer_promotion_recruit_people AS 'trainerPromotionRecruitPeople'
FROM tb_matching_user_trainer AS mt INNER JOIN tb_notice_promotion_trainer AS pt ON mt.trainer_promotion_notice_code = pt.trainer_promotion_notice_code WHERE mt.trainer_id = #{trainerId};
